criteria: Ability to identify equivalent algebraic expressions through simplification and application of properties.
Proficiency in substituting values into expressions to determine equivalence.
Explanation and justification of equivalent expressions.
descriptions: Does not demonstrate understanding of algebraic expressions or equivalence.
Struggles to identify equivalent expressions and rarely applies properties correctly.
Identifies some equivalent expressions but makes frequent errors in simplification or application of properties.
Generally identifies equivalent expressions and applies properties of operations with occasional errors.
Consistently identifies equivalent expressions and correctly applies properties of operations to justify equivalence.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of equivalent expressions, applying properties of operations fluently and justifying reasoning clearly and accurately.
Unable to substitute values into expressions or determine equivalence.
Attempts to substitute values but makes significant errors, failing to determine equivalence correctly.
Substitutes values with some errors, occasionally determining equivalence accurately.
Substitutes values correctly most of the time and usually determines equivalence accurately.
Consistently substitutes values accurately and determines equivalence with a clear explanation.
Demonstrates mastery in substituting values to determine equivalence, providing thorough and accurate justifications.
Provides no explanation or justification for equivalent expressions.
Provides minimal or unclear explanations for equivalent expressions.
Attempts to explain equivalent expressions but lacks clarity and accuracy.
Explains equivalent expressions with reasonable clarity and accuracy.
Clearly and accurately explains equivalent expressions, justifying the reasoning used.
Provides comprehensive and insightful explanations of equivalent expressions, demonstrating a deep understanding of underlying principles.
